title: Y3shot
author: Y3shot
content: Since I know cryptocurrency my biggest fear is to lost all my capital or large amounts in trading or investment, because of the fear in me I don't do things that I'm not sure of or things I don't know. My fear to lose have always been a motivation or a reason for me to know things concerning cryptocurrency,  I fear to start trading when I'm of myself that I know nothing to trade , fear to start investment when I know that I don't have a source of income. My fear have been a motivation to learn,  even If I start trading I may lose but not to lose everything because of the understanding I have. My fear to lose have always made me to take the right decisions and not to make money money my first ultimate in trading and investment but understanding as my first priority. I know some of my mates who are into  cryptocurrency that phobia to lose but even with the fear to lose they still go ahead to trade. If beginners allows their fear to motivate them to learn first their won't be drastic lose in trading.

comments.author: Mia Chloe
comments.body: So are you trying to say fear is your drive in the crypto space? Your write up seems to be a form of motivation to newbies but in the real world fear in trading or hodling will only cause losses because you find yourself selling your hodlings in dip instead of strategizing when to sell and hodl in bull.instead of letting fear drive you I suggest you allow experience and research take the place of fear.QuoteSince I know cryptocurrency my biggest fear is to lost all my capital or large amounts in trading or investment,  the main reason people lose in the crypto space is lack of sufficient knowledge and research  I don't think if you have a good understanding of block chain and Bitcoin basics you will end up just losing your funds or hodlings.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Being afraid of losing or losing some of your money in trading is a natural feeling. We all do not like to lose money, but what is not understood is the loss of all of your capital or large amounts, as it indicates a problem in your investment strategy. If you diversify your investments, the possibility of there being a loss will decrease. All your capital and the problem becomes how to reduce losses to be much less than profits and thus trading will be profitable. More learning will put an end to the idea of losing all the money from your head and will reduce the loss of large amounts. The only problem remains reducing losses compared to profits.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Why being scared mate? There's nothing to fear when you have good knowledge and understanding of how Bitcoin works. You just have to be smart and carful type, not the fearful one. Your fear exposes you to more risk and I don't see how fear can motivate someone. Quote from: Y3shot on September 29, 2023, 12:03:40 PMI know some of my mates who are into  cryptocurrency that phobia to lose but even with the fear to lose they still go ahead to trade. If beginners allows their fear to motivate them to learn first their won't be drastic lose in trading.I won't call that fear, but thier ability to recognize that trading  is risky and they should be aware of all potential risk involved before going into trading. I don't think newbies should allow fear or rather FOMO to be a motivation to them, I don't see how it motivates any one. But if you ask questions and do research properly, with enough knowledge theres nothing to be scared of when dealing with Bitcoin or cryptocurrency.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Fear of the unknown has made lots of people remain in their comfort zones. It is a resistant force that gives one no reason to make an attempt to engage with what seems challenging to make end results. For some people, it is a way forward and to some people, it is a call for caution. When out of curiosity you make a move damning the result or outcome of the situation of the risk taken, you find out that you have learned something new. Ordinarily, one would not have done what you could have done if not for conquering fear. When you put effort into learning doing away with fear no matter the result of it, you find out that you have learned something new, and that knowledge you get keeps you up and doing. Until one conquers fear, one can not be able to make any move for achievement.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: I can relate to your fear and I do understand that losing money is scary. The fear of losing money would either end up in ignoring trading or encouraging us to learn to trade. Too much fear will lead to overthinking and overthinking in a risky venture will always lead to failure. The best way to overcome it is by gaining knowledge and following your instincts afterward. I would like to add that trading is risky, if you have the guts to trade and you are open to losing funds while learning then only you should venture into it. Otherwise, stay away from it and think of other options to double your investment.

If you are overwhelmed with as a result of your investment, it means you are over investing and this is wrong. Irrespective of how lucrative it may appear, I think being about to invest only what you are comfortable with is the best decision. For clarity, you can never be sure of anything in life and even in cryptocurrency,  there is no guarantees.  Quote from: Y3shot on September 29, 2023, 12:03:40 PMMy fear to lose have always been a motivation or a reason for me to know things concerning cryptocurrency,  I fear to start trading when I'm of myself that I know nothing to trade , fear to start investment when I know that I don't have a source of income.  I will suggest you take some courses on psychology so you will be able to overcome these fears. You can search Mark Douglas on YouTube,  he did some nice work about trading psychology. You cannot win in this market with this level of fear. Understanding that there risk involve and taking steps to mitigate these risks is what lead to success in investing.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: It is normal to have fear and worry about the investment made with Bitcoin.  I agree with @OP that to quell that fear, one must strive to learn and acquire knowledge about the venture he is investing with or trading with.  Knowledge is the best solution for fear since fear is caused by worries about unknown circumstances and having knowledge about Bitcoin trading, the cycles, and the patter of the Bitcoin market will assure us of something in the future.  So learning these knowledge will make us diminish the fears and worries and we will have peace of mind holding our BTC and be ing patient to wait for the future great opportunity to profit.

But in terms of trading which I believe the OP is referring to, no person is save from losing there funds on it. The knowledgeable person only reduces the risk of losing just anyhow that a less knowledgeable person does because he is knowledgeable on many aspects like analysis and stuffs like that. But saying they wouldn’t lose is not something right because even the most favourite team in a game of sport loses sometimes

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: I don't know what you guys are so crazy about trading. It is clear that the marketing that promotes it has you well eaten in the head. If you are afraid of trading, just don't do it. I'll give you another reason, well over 90% of traders lose money, this in the stock market, and I'm sure that with cryptocurrency trading is even closer to 100%. So if you are afraid of losing money with trading, you are right. So don't do it.

comments.author: Patrol69
comments.body: If you are afraid of trading or investing then you can never risk money trading or investing. There are many differences between saving and investing. If you save money, the money will be safe but the money will not grow, but if you invest, the money will be leaning but the money will have the potential to grow. If you think that if you invest your money there is a possibility of losing it and if that money is lost it can have a very bad effect on your life then you should refrain from investing. Investment experts always say that you invest as much money as you can afford to lose. You must invest at the risk of losing your money.

Fear can be a good motivation to do or start something the right way, but fear which can be good, can also be very bad. Fear can limit you and make you set mental barriers for yourself. Fear can get you feeling the need to play it too safe which is not too good because in playing it too safe, never pushing yourself because of fear, you will remain the way you are. Fear can be cautioning to you when you think of trading bitcoins, but do not let the fear make you never consider getting knowledge about trading to start it or even trying to start investing in bitcoins.
